#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long int a,b,sum;

for( ; ; )
{
int carry=0;
cin>>a>>b;
if(a==0&&b==0)
    break;
    long int temp1,temp2;
while(a>0||b>0)
{
temp1=a%10;temp2=b%10;
a=a/10;b=b/10;
if(temp1+temp2>9)
carry++;
}
if(carry==0)
cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl<<endl;
else
if(carry==1)
cout<<carry<<" carry operation."<<endl<<endl;
else
cout<<carry<<" carry operations."<<endl<<endl;

}
return 0;}
